data.title: PS Remote Play | Download the PS Remote Play app and stream PS5 and PS4 games to your device | PlayStation
data.meta_description: Stream your PS4 and PS5 games to any compatible iOS or Android device, PC or Mac, and play using your DualSense or DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controller. Download the free app now.
data.text:
Android devices

Android smartphones and tablets running Android 9 or later can play PS Remote Play games using on-screen controls. Smartphones and tablets running Android 10 or higher can connect to a DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controller via Bluetooth9. The DualSense wireless controller is supported on Android smartphones and tablets running Android 12 or later10. Android phone devices running Android 10.0 or above are compatible with the Backbone One-PlayStation Edition.

Android TVs and Chromecast with Google TV running OS 12 or later can play PS Remote Play games using a DualSense10 or DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controller9.

To check what Android devices support DualSense and DUALSHOCK 4 controller drivers, please consult your device's manufacturer.

1Titles that require a VR headset (PlayStation VR or PlayStation VR2) or additional peripherals (other than a DUALSHOCK 4, DualSense, or DualSense Edge wireless controller) and games that must be streamed using a PS Plus Premium membership are not compatible with PS Remote Play.

2The latest system software is required.

3PS Remote Play on Android TV is downloadable on devices running Android TV OS 12 or later. It is currently available on Chromecast with Google TV (4k and HD models) and the BRAVIA XR A95L model TV.

4Increased distance between the PS5 or PS4 console and the remote TV may increase latency.

5DualSense is available on Android smartphones and tablets (Android 12 or later), Android TV devices (Android TV OS 12 or later), iPhone and iPad (iOS 14.5 or later), Mac (11.3 or later) via Bluetooth and Windows PC via USB connection. DualSense Edge is available on Mac (13.3 or later) via Bluetooth and Windows PC via USB connection. DUALSHOCK 4 is available on Android smartphones and tablets (Android 10 or later), Android TV devices (Android TV OS 12 or later), iPhone and iPad (iOS 14 or later), Mac (11 or later) via Bluetooth and Windows PC via USB connection.

6PlayStation Portal™ Remote Player can stream compatible games installed on your PS5 console. PlayStation Portal™ Remote Player requires broadband internet Wi-Fi with at least 5Mbps for use. For a better play experience, a high-speed connection of at least 15Mbps is recommended. The quality and connectivity of your play experience may vary depending on your network environment. A PS5 console and account for PlayStation Network is required. The PS5 console must be connected to a broadband internet connection, powered on fully or in Rest Mode, and it must be paired with your PlayStation Portal™ Remote Player.

7Haptic feedback and adaptive trigger features are only available when those features are supported by the game being played.

8Individual game performance will vary based on the specific game being played, and the quality of connectivity in your network environment.

9DUALSHOCK 4 features as Touch Pad, Motion Sensor, Light Bar and Vibration might not be available. DUALSHOCK 4 controller audio output is not supported by PS Remote Play on Android TV. For instructions on how to pair the DUALSHOCK 4 controller to other devices, visit playstation.com/support/hardware/ps4-pair-dualshock-4-wireless-with-pc-or-mac/

10Availability of DualSense features such as audio output and haptic effects vary when using remote play on Android, PC, Mac, iPhone or iPad; some features may not be available. DualSense haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, controller audio output, and built-in microphone are not supported by PS Remote Play on Android TV. For instructions on how to pair the DualSense controller to other devices, visit playstation.com/support/hardware/pair-dualsense-controller-bluetooth.

“PlayStation”, “PlayStation Family Mark”, “PS5 logo”, “PS5”, “PS4”, “DualSense”, “DualSense Edge” and “DUALSHOCK” are registered trademarks or trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc. “SONY” is a registered trademark of Sony Corporation.
